title: Shifting the bullseye from budget issues to debt ceiling
description: How will the markets react to another government shutdown deadline?

teaser: How will the markets react to another government shutdown deadline?
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, September 23, 2013
contentencoded:
It's a week before a government shutdown deadline in America and the morning after a big victory for German Chancellor Angela Merkel. Carl Riccadonna, senior economist at Deutsche Bank, joins Marketplace Morning Report host Mark Garrison to discuss the potential market reaction to both news events. 

Click the audio player above to hear more.
